caption.p: Summary of the data sets used in this study.

tr.td: Corpus for assessing reporting of the sex and age of the mice
Manual inspection for finding the location of the mention of the sex and age of the mice
Enhancing the performance of the text-mining rules

fn.p: *Supplementary file 1 also contains data sets of the six groups of diseases analyzed (cardiovascular diseases; cancer; diabetes mellitus; lung diseases; infectious diseases; and neurological disorders), as well as of the different approaches to assess the disease models (i.e. genetics, immunology, physiopathology and therapy), and the disease example for each of the six disease groups.
